review: I absolutely love this thing. I canceled cable due to te constant increases and now we use chromecast. Super easy to set up and you can't beat the price.
author: Leanne Montoya

review: all very good - except a satisfying Manual how to use it with the TV and the Computer
author: Alexa Rostoska "Sunflower"

review: Was not what I expected and will not stream unless WiFi is perfect. My wifi isn't the best so I can not use it at all
author: Chelsea Skinner

review: No more dangling wires to connect to a power source like a computer. The wire fits nicely behind the chromecast TV out of the way
author: Josh Glyn

review: A little more difficult to use than what I expected.  Otherwise an excellent product.
author: jallopy

review: With this little dude I don't need a cable subscription any more. Netflix and Plex have me covered. Love it.
author: Christopher Nibert
